StatusFilter.description:
Allows explicit filtering on the language level status field. Depending on which status filter is specified, the objects with following status types can be returned:
Status filterReturned status types
AllAll status types
LatestReleasedLatest released excluding out-of-date
DraftOrLatestReleasedDraft and latest released excluding out-of-date
AllReleasedAll released including out-of-date
